eu_initiatives:
Legislation that has or might have an impact on tourism in Europe, including: 
- indirect taxation 
- visa facilitation 
- single market / digital single market 
- online marketplace 
- package travel 
- coach and driver regulation 
- joint promotion 
- EU-China Tourism Year
